description: Boasting a splendid location with an outdoor dining space on a kind of raft-cum-platform, this restaurant boasts one of the most delightful views in Venice, with the Giudecca on the opposite side of the canal. Contemporary cuisine with a focus on fish and the occasional creative twist.
